AstroObjectEntry.Entry:
QUANTUM_LEAN QUANTUM LEAN!!!!!!
LEAN true
LEAN_LANDING A quantum moon with a thick atmosphere made out of lean. The quantum lean's surface changes based on what planet it orbits, and it seems as if it can orbit planets in any system. But if anything, I LOVE... I LOVE LEAN!!!!!!!!

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai went to the mysterious purple moon orbiting Wher.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai found an engraving in the terrain that look like a line on a hexagon going from the middle-left to the bottom-left.

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai did not want to venture to the other lean variants. Instead, they built a space station to "hack" the lean.

ExploreFact.Text: Apparently, the hacking of the lean was successful. However, they managed to find all but one coordinate.

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai decided to venture to the Solare system to try to find the last coordinate.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai found the last coordinate to the Lean, engraved in ice, along with a creepy message.

The Nomai found all the coordinates to their vessel, and were instructed to go somewhere. I believe that since I have learned these coordinates, I can use the Vessel and warp to where they went. Unfortunately, this requires me to disable the ATP. Eh, if I'm fast enough, I can probably go to the Eye.
Tip: You'll have to warp to Funny System before you warp to the ending. Blame NH.
